channel.title: Fixture on Sports Club
channel.description: Recent content in Fixture on Sports Club

item.title: Example Event - U14 Mixed vs City Rivals
item.description:
Match Details

This is an example event demonstrating the content reference picker feature. Teams and venues are selected from their respective collections using searchable dropdowns in the CMS.

Teams Participating

The teams listed above are automatically linked to their team pages, and this event will appear on their upcoming events lists.

Venue Information

The venue details are automatically pulled from the venue content collection.

How to Attend

Come support our teams! The match is open to all club members and families.
